body: I suggest to update the [proposal process documentation](https://github.com/golang/proposal). It appears that it implies agreement in a final discussion for a proposal to be accepted. It states "In Go development historically, a lack of agreement means decline." But this assumes that it is possible to reach agreement in an open forum at github. I have no problem with the Google team having the final call, but please be explicit about it, because otherwise people will be disappointed.
